requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

getBestBorrowUnitPrices(bytes32).notice: Gets the best prices for borrowing in the selected currency.

getBestLendUnitPrices(bytes32).notice: Gets the best prices for lending in the selected currency.

getBorrowOrderBook(bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Gets the order book of borrow orders.

getItayoseEstimation(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets the estimation of the Itayose process.

getLendOrderBook(bytes32,uint256,uint256.notice: Gets the order book of lend orders.

getOrderBookDetail(bytes32,uint256).notice: Gets detailed information on the order book.

getOrderBookDetails(bytes32).notice: Gets the array of detailed information on the order book

getOrderBookDetails(bytes32[]).notice: Gets the array of detailed information on the order book

getOrders(bytes32,address).notice: Gets user's active and inactive orders in the order book by currency

getOrders(bytes32,uint256,address).notice: Gets user's active and inactive orders in the order book by maturity

getOrders(bytes32[],address).notice: Gets user's active and inactive orders in the order book

getPositions(bytes32,address).notice: Gets user's active positions of the selected currency

getPositions(bytes32[],address).notice: Gets user's active positions of the selected currencies.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.
